entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
